description: To provide a scholarship to a UCO student in the Mass Communication Department who is a Media Studies Minor. Eligibility Requirements Declared Media Studies Minor Junior or senior standing in the fall semester that the scholarship is disbursed Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled in a minimum of 12 credit hours

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Minor_2 is Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Minor_2 is Mass Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Minor is Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Minor is Mass Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major_2 is Mass Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major_2 is Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major is Mass Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major is Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Mass Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Mass Comm-Media Studies   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Comm-Media Studies
